name: Bruises and Battles
description:
Don't forget to put comments below. I plan to continue developing this game further!

The theme for GMTK Game Jam - 2020 was "Out of Control". I expanded on a rough idea of an RPG game that you were not in control of the battles. That gave birth to this game where you are a manager of a party of demons who are racing to be the fastest to beat six unique troops of enemies. If you do achieve this, make sure to comment on your Proof of Completion, and I will try to keep the high score in the description. 

Features:

  • A completely new twist on the RPG genre, by having you act solely as a manager of the party
  • Balancing the Health, Energy, and Morale while trying to fight six unique troops
  • Full Tutorial in-game
  • Manual High Score via the comments
  • Classic RPG Maker Menus

There are some custom songs and sound effects thanks to Forrest Z. Shooster; a list can be found below of the use and file song name.

  • Title Music - Endurance Battle Tune
  • Battle1 Music - Slower Battle
  • Battle2 Music - Faster Battle
  • Menu Music - Menu
  • Shop Music - Shop
  • Cursor Sound Effect - Menu Switch
  • Cursor Confirm Sound Effect - Menu Select
  • Damage Appear Sound Effect - Hurt
  • Purchase Sound Effect - Shop Buy
  • Battle Victory Sound Effect - Victory
  • Battle Defeat Sound Effect - Lose

Current HighScores (✔ means verified)

FAQs

    1. My phone is having issue with the double tap?
         A. This is a known issue with some phones, sorry please use a computer or different phone.

    2. How do I get included in the high scores?
         A. First, must beat the game and take a screenshot of either the credit scroll or the Proof of Completion dialog box. Second, leave a comment with that image and the name you would like in the high score table.

     3. I have a bug/feature request, how do I submit it?
         A. You can always reach me at ransomgmtk2020@gmail.com
